description.content: Heracule’s shoves can be in any direction.
Heracule’s second effect triggers +1 more time.
You may rush 1 before using Battering Ram.
You can also shove objects with Battering Ram. The object triggers collide effects on the first character it collides with.

If Land Waster’s effect shockwave shoves 2 or more foes or allies, cure yourself.

If you only shove one foe, they gain hatred of you after this ability resolves.

You and your ally both have have counter while you are in the aura.

You also have counter while Rook’s aura is active.
You can also inflict hatred on a foe that triggers Rook’s effect, but no more than once a round.
You gain phasing while rushing. Foes you passed through take 2 damage after your movement resolves, and are shoved 1 to either side of your movement.
Allies adjacent to you during any part of this rush are shoved 1 in any direction after this ability resolves.
Exceed: Gain 6 vigor.
You can rush 1 before using Demon Cutter. Charge: rush 3 instead.

Yourself and allies that end their turn adjacent to your weapon gain 2 vigor.
